title: Roman font with A without middle bar
content:
Hello everyone,

I just found this job on Deviant Art and i loved the font used in the title, mainly the roman A, modern, withou the bar... does anyone know similar fonts? not so modern, sofisticated and at the same time with roman traces...

Thank you very much

comments.content:
There are similar fonts, commonly labeled as demi or semi serif.  
To make them the designer snips off various serifs, and voila! a new font.  
This one may be a custom snip job. The crossbar on A has joined various serifs in the trashcan.  
Compare the snipped version on the lhs with the one on the rhs, which is probably the source font.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150331013218im_/http:/typophile.com/files/snip_5615.jpg)
  
Don
how about [Gara](http://web.archive.org/web/20150331013218/http:/www.ffonts.net/gara.font). still have to snip the A but otherwise a match, no?

Works for me as a match.  
BTW the contours of Gara looked very familiar.  
I checked and confirmed an exact match with Adobe Garamond LT, regular, except for the snipped parts.  
To confirm, check an unmodified letter such as g, or 5, in Fontshop.  
I suspect that Adobe would see Gara as an infringement. The embedding permissions for Adobe Garamond are "Only printing and previewing of the document is allowed (read-only)."  
Don
You could just use a Greek version of the desired typeface and replace \*A\* by Greek \*Lambda\*.
